key.name: auto-update
key.description: Sets whether or not to periodically check for feed updates.

key.name: start-update
key.description: Sets whether or not to update when launching the application(Ignored by -n)

key.name: auto-update-freq
key.description: How often to check for updates, in minutes.

key.name: unread-only
key.description: Whether or not to display unread and starred feeds only by default.

key.name: items-per-list
key.description: The max number of items to display at a time.

key.name: download-attachments
key.description: Sets whether to download or open attachments when clicked.

key.name: ask-download-location
key.description: Sets whether or not to ask where to download attachments.

key.name: default-download-location
key.description: Where to download attachments by default

key.name: link-command
key.summary: Command to call when opening links
key.description: This defines what gets called when opening links. '%s' inserts the address.

key.name: cookie-db-path
key.description: The path to a database that should be used for getting cookies. This has been tested with Firefox's cookies, but not other web browsers.
